metadata.title: KaraMD Comfort Guard X24 - Natural Joint Support Supplement - with Turmeric Curcumin, Boswellia & Ginger - Vegetable Capsules - 30 Servings (90 Capsules) - 4 Pack
features: Natural Joint Support Supplement: KaraMD's Comfort Guard X24 uses natural and responsibly sourced ingredients to support the management of joint discomfort from aging, exercise, or daily activities
Powerful Turmeric Curcumin & Boswellia: This joint supplement uses pure curcuminoids and a critical dose of boswellia for multi-pathway in the body. It's also vegan-friendly, gluten-free, and non-GMO

Vital Ginger Root Extract: These capsules have pure ginger root extract, which supports against muscle discomfort, joint aches; it's also a natural catalyst for absorption of pure curcuminoids, which may support the body's overall response.

Doctor Formulated:This natural dietary supplement is backed by science and knowledge to support better health and is non-GMO, gluten-free, vegan-friendly, formulated in the USA and made with high-quality and reliably sourced ingredients
Satisfaction Guarantee: Your purchase of KaraMD Comfort Guard X24 health supplement is fully protected by an unconditional 90-day refund guarantee because we truly care about your customer experience
description: Research shows that natural herbs like turmeric, ginger, boswellia and the unique combination of these ingredients in Comfort Guard X24 helps to reduce joint discomfort from aging, exercise, or everyday activity. Born from Dr. Kara’s decades of experience seeing patients suffer not only from discomfort but also complications from harmful drugs, Comfort Guard X24 is a natural alternative to support your body’s response. This daily health supplement is formulated as a veggie capsule. Take 3 Comfort Guard X24 vegetable capsules per day with 8 fluid ounces of water. Formulated with care Professionally lab tested for quality Quality inspected and safety sealed Non-GMO, gluten-free and vegan-friendly Dr. Kara has 30+ years of experience with patients. After spending the early part of his career treating patients at The Cleveland Clinic, Dr. Kara spent the last several years focusing his work on functional medicine and natural remedies to help people live healthier lives. In 2018, he created KaraMD, a line of supplements focused on overall health.
